item.title: Senate GOP Prepares To Hold The Line On Hyde As White House Walks Back Trump’s ‘Be Flexible’ Remark
item.description: ‘I am absolutely committed to ensuring that no taxpayer funding is used to fund the radical left’s agenda, including abortion,’ Sen. Moreno said.

item.title: Corporate Media’s 7 Most Brazenly Fake Claims About The Anti-ICE Car-Ramming
item.description: The more details emerge, the fewer of the corporate media's claims about the Minneapolis car-ramming of an ICE agent turn out to be true.

item.title: History Supports Trump’s Operation To Take Down Maduro
item.description: History shows that President Trump is on firm ground when he orders troops into combat – even without congressional approval.

item.title: Court: Washington State Can’t Force Christian Mission To Hire Non-Christians
item.description: A panel of the 9th Circuit unanimously rejected Washington’s attempt to force a religious ministry to hire employees whose beliefs contradict those of...

item.title: Jack Smith Deposition Shows His Get-Trump Lawfare Was Also A War On Free Speech
item.description: Jack Smith’s deposition testimony betrayed his utter disdain for the fundamental right to freedom of speech enshrined in the First Amendment.
